metadata.title: CVE-2021-24116 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In wolfSSL through 4.6.0, a side-channel vulnerability in base64 PEM file decoding allows system-level (administrator) attackers to obtain information about secret RSA keys via a controlled-channel and side-channel attack on software running in isolated environments that can be single stepped, especially Intel SGX.

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
